doc:
Brian Krause https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Krause 0 Brian Jeffrey Krause (born February 1, 1969) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Leo Wyatt on The WB television series Charmed (1998–2006) and for portraying the lead role of Charles Brady in the 1992 horror film Sleepwalkers. Brian_Jeffrey_Krause ( born February_1_,_1969 ) is an_American_actor . He is_known for his_role as Leo_Wyatt on The_WB_television_series_Charmed_(_1998 – 2006_) and for portraying the_lead_role of Charles_Brady in the_1992_horror_film_Sleepwalkers .
